sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; const Buscador = () => { const [data, setData] = useState([]); const URL = "http://localhost:3011/getposts"; const loadData = async () => { const response = await axios.get(URL); setData(response.data); console.log(response.data); }; useEffect(() => { loadData(); }, []) return (

Todos los Posts

{data.map((item, index) => (

Autor:{item.st_Autor}

{item.st_Titulo}

{item.st_Contenido}
))}
); }; export default Buscador;
